plot: Rosalee surprises Monroe with a birthday getaway and invites the gang to join them; at a hotel, an employee targets Nick to avenge his father; Eve is visited by a familiar dark force; Capt. Renard spends the weekend with Diana.

Rosalee surprises Monroe with a trip to a nice hotel for the weekend and invites Nick, Adalind, Juliet, Hank and Wu to come along too. However, by chance, the son of a man Nick arrested and consequently locks up, recognizes Nick and vows to have his revenge, employing a most unusual method.—Jamie melia

Monroe treats his friends gang to an adult weekend in a romantic hotel, but feral waiter Randy Goode recognizes Nick as the man who put his father Willard in jail and promises dad vengeance by slipping a chemical in their drinks which removes all inhibitions. Left home, Renard spends interesting time with Diana. A dark force focuses on Eve through a mirror.—KGF Vissers
